Text.Page:
It's time to punish the giants for allying with Thulsa. Whatever the prize, we're about to make it much more costly.

It's hard to imagine the giants' rationale. They fought the gods long ago, now they decide to work with the worst of the worst?

Inconceivable.

The giants aren't so numerous that they can shrug off those deaths, .

No doubt they rue the day they agreed to Thulsa's little pact.
